title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example using Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only), the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they do not have any effect. This is observed when opening a small image, such as an icon, where the scrollbars are misleading as they do not have any functionality.
SR:
1. Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only).
2. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.
3. Observe that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they do not have any effect.
4. Open a small image, like an icon, and notice that the scrollbars are misleading as they do not have any functionality.
